info.name: Median eminence
info.description: The median eminence is a surface elevation in the mid-portion of the tuber cinereum of the hypothalamus. It is located between the optic chiasm and mammillary bodies on the ventral aspect of the hypothalamus. The infundibulum or stalk of the pituitary extends from the midpoint of this area to the posterior lobe of the pituitary.  The medial eminence is one of the circumventricular organs and is the site of release of hypothalamic hormones into the hypothalamic-hypophyseal portal system.
